official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to eliminate certain restrictions upon the methods of reproduction or duplication of periodical duplication to be entered and mailed second class mail.

summary.text: Eliminates certain restrictions upon the methods of reproduction or duplication of periodical duplication to be entered and mailed second-class mail.
